item.title: 統計學與實習
item.description: TA class New Project File > New Project.. New Project Set the directory name and the subdirectory. R Markdown You can write the report with RMarkdown. It can generate HTML, PDF, Word, and PPT documents. Furthermore, math equations can be write with LaTex format. Find the cheet sheet from Help > Cheetsheets > R Markdown Cheet Sheet Create your R Markdown! R Markdown Add the title and author name. Setup
